"Wired Lance Boot Camp VII":
"Just the person I wanted to see. Joseph, retired ARKS
training officer, at your service. Your previous boot
camp results were outstanding. But did you really
think you'd become a true master of the wired lance?
Well, there's always room for improvement. To reach
the top, you'll have to complete this training mission.

*Complete the mission within 22 minutes on Hard
difficulty or above, using wired lances only."

"よくぞ来た！　退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
先の特訓の成果、見事と言っておこう。
だが、よもやこれでワイヤードランスを
マスターしたとは思うまい？
そう、まだまだ上には上がいるのだ！
頂上を目指すために、提示する課題を
易々とクリアしてみせるがいい！

※自在槍系専用
ハード以上、22分以内にクリア"
